titleStmt.title: His sacred majesty Charles the II. His royal title anagramatiz'd.
titleStmt.author: Rowland, John, 1606-1660.

notesStmt.note: Also includes: In honor of the Lord General Monck, and Thomas Allen Lord Major of London, for their great valour, loyalty, and prudence. Epinicia.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
